text: agarache un logon kee radagiradaanee (munh pherana) tum par shaaq zarur hai (lekin) agar tumhaara bas chale to zameen ke andar koee suragan dhandh nikaalo ya aasamaan mein seedhee lagao aur unhen koee maujiza la dikhao (to ye bhee kar dekho) agar khuda chaahata to un sab ko raahe raast par ikattha kar deta (magar vah to imtihaan karata hai) bas (dekho) tum haragiz zaalimon mein (shaamil) na hona
